title: Find Materials: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Materials are located in the Martin Reading room, with the exception of architecture materials which are shelved in the adjacent Architecture Reading Room. Books and serials are shelved according to the Dewey Decimal system (the arts are the 700s), and since 2014, materials have been classified in Library of Congress (Art and architecture are classified in the Ns). Materials in both the Martin Reading Room and the Architecture Reading Room are shelved in three sizes. See our map for more detailed locations of materials.
